name: add_to_list
description: Add items to an existing list.

list_id.description: The unique identifier of the list to which items will be added.

query.description: A search query to find the list by its title.

search_term.description: The name of the list to search for.

query_expansion.description: A list of synonyms to expand the search.

list_name.description: Name of the list to create if it does not exist.

elements_to_add.description: A non-empty list of strings to add.

is_bulk_mutation.description: Indicates an intent to modify multiple lists (not yet implemented).

name: append_to_note
description: Appends text content to an existing note identified by its ID or a search query.

query.description: A search query to find the target note, used if `note_id` is not provided.

query_expansion.description: A list of synonyms or related terms to expand the search query.

note_id.description: The ID of the note to which content will be appended.

text_content.description: The text to append to the existing note.

name: create_list
description: Creates a new list with optional initial items, requiring a list name if items are added.

list_name.description: The name for the list, if explicitly provided; otherwise, a name should be generated from `elements_to_add`, unless `elements_to_add` is also empty.

elements_to_add.description: The items to add to the list, from user input or `google_search` results, which should be in the user's query language unless suggested otherwise.

generated_title.description: A generated title for the list, required if `list_name` is empty, based on the items being added and the prompt context.

name: create_note
description: Creates a new note in the user's query language, requiring a title if text content is provided.

title.description: The user-specified title for the note. If a title is not provided, one must be generated from the `text_content` and prompt context, unless `text_content` is also empty.

text_content.description: The note's text content, which can be from user input or a `google_search` result, and must be in the user's query language unless specified otherwise.

generated_title.description: A title generated from the `text_content` and prompt context, required if the `title` parameter is empty.

name: delete_list_item
description: Deletes specific items from a list, which is found by its ID or a search, using item IDs or search criteria.

search_term.description: Name or keywords used to search for the list.

query.description: A query for searching notes and list items, which requires a title to also be specified.

query_expansion.description: A list of strings containing synonyms or related terms to expand the search query.

list_id.description: The ID of the list containing the items to be deleted.

elements_to_delete.description: A list of item IDs to be deleted.

name: delete_notes_and_lists
description: Deletes notes and lists identified by a search term, query, query expansion, or item ID.

search_term.description: The name or keywords to search for lists or notes.

query.description: A query for searching notes and list items that should not be set if the title is unspecified.

query_expansion.description: A list of synonyms or related terms for search query expansion.

item_ids.description: A list of note and/or list IDs to delete; use instead of `search_term` when the IDs are available.

item_id.description: The ID of the note or list to delete.

name: get_notes_and_lists
description: Retrieves notes or lists by specific IDs, a query, or search terms, and can be filtered by type.

item_ids.description: A list of specific note or list IDs to retrieve.

query.description: A query for searching notes and items within lists.

search_term.description: The core identifying name of, or search terms for, a note or list, excluding verbs like 'show' or 'get'; use only when a provider is not specified.

hint.description: The type of object to retrieve (`NOTE`, `LIST`, or `ANY`), inferred from the user's prompt. Defaults to `None`.

name: search_notes_and_lists
description: Searches notes and lists by query with an optional type hint, returning a flat list of results if `legacy` is `True`.

name: show_all
description: Retrieves all notes, lists, or both, returning their complete details.

hint.description: Filters the results by type: `LIST` (lists only), `NOTE` (notes only), or `ANY` (both). Defaults to `None`, which also shows both.

name: show_notes_and_lists
description: Displays specific notes or lists identified by their IDs or a search query.

item_ids.description: A list of note or list IDs to show.

query.description: A query to search for notes and lists when their IDs are unknown.

name: undo
description: Revert one or more previous operations by their IDs.

undo_operation_ids.description: A list of operation IDs to undo.

name: update_list_item
description: Update an existing item in a specified list.

list_id.description: The identifier for the list containing the item.

list_item_id.description: The ID of the list item to update.

updated_element.description: The updated content for the list item.

search_term.description: A search term to find the list by its title or item content when the `list_id` is not provided.

name: update_note
description: Updates an existing note's content, identified by a search term, query, or note ID, by adding, appending, prepending, or inserting text.

search_term.description: The name of the note or keywords to search for.

query_expansion.description: A list of synonyms or related terms to expand the search query.

note_id.description: The unique ID of the note to be updated; use this for a direct match instead of `search_term`.

text_content.description: The text content to use for the update.

update_type.description: The type of update operation to perform, which must be one of: `APPEND`, `PREPEND`, `REPLACE`, `MOVE`, or `EDIT`.

name: update_title
description: Updates the title of an existing list or note, identifying the item by a search term, query, or direct item ID.

search_term.description: The name of, or keywords to search for, the note or list.

query.description: A query for searching notes and list items.

query_expansion.description: A list of synonyms or related terms to expand the search query.

item_id.description: The ID of the note or list to be updated; use this instead of `search_term` if available.

updated_title.description: The updated title for the note or list.
